translations: 三百周年纪念；三百周年纪念的庆祝

sentences.sentence: As the rain fell Friday night, many anniversary celebrants remained in Tercentenary Theatre, clustered in humid knots huddled under their umbrellas. The water fell in gray sheets, as from a waterfall.
sentences.translation: 由于星期五晚上下雨,许多周年庆典者一直呆在三百年庆典的露天剧场里,以潮 湿的一小群的打着伞挤在一起的形式的群集着.水落在古灰色的板子上,就像从一个瀑布上面下来的.
